page.title: 16A Mother's Typical Tuesday.
page.content: {06.30}The baby wakes up for a feed. {07.00}Wash and prepare the breakfast. Give the baby his cereal. Wash up the dishes and get dressed. {08.30}Make the beds & take the girls to school. Collect Family Allowance. {09.00}Go and pick up my friend to shop in Crowborough & have a cup of coffee. {10.50}Go home & unpack the food. The baby sleeps while I prepare lunch. Usually I get something from the free- zer. If it's sunny I sit outside and knit until the baby wakes. Feed him then 'whisk' the vacuum cleaner round. {14.45}Watch the girls swim at school. {15.50}Home from school. We have a cup of tea and biscuits. {17.30}Take the girls to Brownies. {17.50}Organise Weds. dinner. Put load of washing in machine before watching T.V. after children are in bed. {22.00}Go to bed exhausted!
